name: Basuphana (Tide Of The Eclipse) DEMO
description:
Enter the world of Spellia.
Melenta is a young girl who loses her parents on planet Ecliptia caused by a Blood Red Moon Eclipse. She gets sent the help of a pink kitty that has magical powers to help transport Melenta to another world, where she can live out the rest of her life happily. But strange things begin to happen and a very unusual dark journey unfolds, a mysterious path of new friends and enemies is laid out before her.

The Game is filled with wonder & mystery as flashbacks of events show the past, giving off clues as to what occured before the very game you come to know.

INFO:  Basuphana was going to be the start of a brand new never heard of before series ranging from multiple sequels each having a very different story and flavor with each different game. Some with adventures some comedy and different tastes including fantasy and sci-fi later on.

Demo for Tide of the Eclipse ~ is now playable for those interested to see this lost never before released game.
